ingredients.ingredient: granulated no-calorie sugar substitute (such as Splenda)
salted pumpkin seeds or pepitas, toasted
fine sea salt or kosher salt
cacao bittersweet chocolate baking chips melted
confectioners' sugar, plus more for dusting cookies
Splenda baking blend, plus extra for dipping glass
almond butter or natural peanut butter
unsalted butter melted and cooled to room temperature
cold unsalted butter cut into small pieces
carob molasses (see Tip) or dark honey
instant espresso dissolved in 2 tablespoons warm water
unsweetened cocoa powder American-style or Dutch-process
light corn syrup blended with 3 tablespoons lukewarm water
garri ground into a fine powder
canola oil or other neutral oil
